articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preserving Idea of Independence, Peace and Friendship
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preserving Idea of Independence, Peace and Friendship
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The Worker's Party of Korea and the DPRK government will positively contribute to developing relations of friendship and cooperation with different countries of the world and making the whole world independent, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Independence, peace and friendship are the idea of the foreign policy consistently maintained by the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has firmly maintained independence in foreign relations.
					
					 It does not allow any slightest act of violating the sovereignty of the country and hurting the dignity of the nation but retaliates against it.
					
					 The DPRK deals with any affair in a fair and aboveboard manner, without currying favor with anyone or reading his face in the international arena.
					
					 No one can dictate to the DPRK what it should do as it is advancing under the banner of independence.
					
					 Had the DPRK failed to tightly hold arms, it would have allowed the imperialists to ignite the second Korean war and disturb peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 The DPRK has made its utmost efforts to boost the nation's defense capability, regarding Songun as an important factor of creating a favorable environment for preserving peace and sovereignty. This is aimed to build a thriving nation in a peaceful environment free from a war.
					
					 The DPRK will, in the future, too, make positive efforts to check and frustrate the imperialists' offensive against the DPRK, achieve peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and preserve peace and security in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The DPRK will make every possible effort to establish fair international relations and international order as a member of the international community.
					
					 Invariable and unshakable are the stand and will of the WPK and the DPRK government to consistently materialize the idea of the foreign policy -- independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Actions against U.S. High-handed Practices
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Actions against U.S. High-handed Practices
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The progressive countries of the world should resolutely oppose and reject the U.S. brigandish logic and high-handed practices in order to develop the fair international relations, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. warlike forces have persisted in arbitrary and high-handed practices, asserting that what they do is in line with international law and everything done by those countries courting their displeasure is a breach of international law. 
					
					 The U.S. defies international law, contending that it is above the U.N.  It is perpetrating a war for aggression, violating the sovereignty of other countries. 
					
					 It is free to cook up illegal international law.
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that it attempted to fabricate "a convention on state responsibility" as a legal lever for justifying  interference in the internal affairs of any sovereign country and the use of force against it under the pretext of "violation of international law" in recent years and cooked up the PSI aimed at naval blockade against anti-imperialist, independent countries under the pretext of "preventing the spread of WMDs," etc. and worked hard to upgrade it as an international legal system.
					
					 The U.S. deployed more than 1 000 nuclear weapons in south Korea contrary to NPT, turning it into the biggest nuclear outpost and the most dangerous source of a nuclear war in the Far East. 
					
					 It is also staging ceaseless drills of various forms for a nuclear war in south Korea and its vicinity, escalating the nuclear threat to the DPRK.
					
					 It is applying double standards, classifying international treaties into those essential and unnecessary for it. Moreover, it ignores the treaties. It was none other than the U.S. which unilaterally scrapped the interceptor missile limitation treaty.
					
					 The U.S. contends that it has an "international legal standard" to judge right or wrong, it is allowed to do everything and other countries should unconditionally obey its intention. This U.S.-style brigandish logic is no longer workable.

articles.title: Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Hinges on S. Korean Authorities' Choice
articles.content:
Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Hinges on S. Korean Authorities' Choice
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The north-south relations stand at the crossroads of dialogue and confrontation, peace and war. The future developments entirely depend on what option the south Korean authorities will take.
					 Minju Joson says this in a bylined commentary.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is letting loose a spate of confrontational remarks bedeviling the inter-Korean relations from the outset of the new year, quite contrary to the nation's desire. This behavior is intolerable as it is a blatant challenge and deliberate provocation to the army and people of the DPRK, the commentary says and goes on:
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the group dared hurt the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership, blustering that "north's new leadership should not be bound to the Cold War-minded framework" and "it should opt for reforms and opening".
					
					 The group's recent reckless remarks hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is just a deliberate action to strain the situation by getting on its nerves.
					
					 The tenure of the office of the puppet group is to expire soon. What fate the traitors will face is as clear as a pikestaff. Under this situation the group is making desperate efforts to ignite a war by escalating the tension in its remaining days.
					
					 Already clarified was a principled stand of the DPRK to subordinate everything to the great objective of national reunification, the nation-wide cause, from the stand of giving priority to the nation, attaching importance to the nation and achieving unity of the nation this year.
					
					 It takes two to make a quarrel, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed by British Organization
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed by British Organization
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy released a statement on December 26 last year on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Further Strengthen the Socialist System of Our Country".
					 Saying that Kim Il Sung in his work reviewed that the DPRK victoriously advanced along the way of socialism under the banner of the Juche idea, the statement added:
					
					 The DPRK has pursued policies reflecting the desire and requirements of the people in line with the situation of the country.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Il Sung the socialist system centered on the popular masses was established.
					
					 He in the work comprehensively clarified the advantages of Korean-style socialism based on the Juche idea.
					
					 The working masses fully enjoy the socio-political rights under the Korean-style socialist system based on the Juche idea.
					
					 He clearly explained the superiority of socialism to capitalism in a way easy to understand.
					
					 The statement stressed again that the adherents to the Juche idea and the Songun idea in Britain would deeply study the work of the President once again, calling on the progressive people of the world to avidly study the work.

articles.title: Significant Day of DPRK Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Significant Day of DPRK Observed Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries on December 28 and 29 last year on the occasion of the 1st anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 They included meetings, round-table talks and film shows in Romania, Brazil, Uganda and Myanmar.
					
					 Present there were personages in various circles in the relevant countries and of the regional organizations and masses.
					
					 Attending them on invitation were DPRK ambassadors to those countries and their embassy officials.
					
					 Participants of the film shows watched the Korean film "The Tower of the Juche Idea".
					
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union, in his speech expressed conviction that the KPA holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as its supreme commander would reliably defend peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 The national coordinator of the Genuine Democratic Movement of Brazil who doubles as chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il noted that Kim Jong Un, upon assuming the heavy responsibility as the supreme commander of the KPA, brought about a turning phase in the Korean revolution by leading the struggle of the service personnel and people to victory with his outstanding and seasoned leadership over the last one year.
					
					 S. N. Sserwanga, secretary general of the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, said that thanks to Kim Jong Un the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, has been successfully carried forward and the KPA has developed into an invincible army which no formidable enemy dares provoke.
					
					 Than Tun, general director for Administrative Affairs of the Union of Myanmar Economic Holdings Limited, stressed that the DPRK has achieved the single-mined unity of the whole army and all people and demonstrated its might as an invincible power possessed of powerful nuclear deterrent.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Uganda.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Supreme Commandership Observed in Brazil
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Supreme Commandership Observed in Brazil
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article titled "Leader loving the future" with a photo of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un on its internet homepage on December 31 last year on the occasion of the 1st anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Saying that at present everybody will select Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, as a man attracting the greatest attention in the international community, the article added:
					
					 His ceaseless field guidance to every nook and corner of the country is the subject of the greatest interest of world media.
					
					 What impresses the people in particular is Kim Jong Un's particular love for the younger generation.
					
					 The politics for the rising generation decides the rise and fall of a country.
					
					 Still fresh in the memory of many people is President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, very pleased to see students in new clothes after providing new uniforms to the schoolchildren all over the country, and personally taking pictures of them.
					
					 A tale about leader Kim Jong Il, who sent even a helicopter for triplets in a mountain village, is conveyed as a legend about the love for the younger generation.
					
					 Such love is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The international community sees a bright future of the DPRK in the image of the leader who loves children so much.
					
					 Only victory and glory will be in store for the Korean people dynamically advancing towards a bright future under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Socialist Constitution Introduced by Foreign Media
articles.content:
DPRK's Socialist Constitution Introduced by Foreign Media
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Nigerian and Russian publications dedicated articles to the 40th anniversary of the promulgation of "The Socialist Constitution of the DPRK" by President Kim Il Sung from Dec. 23 to 27 last year.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its internet homepage an article titled "Socialist Constitution," saying that the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK stipulates the Juche idea, Songun idea, as a guiding principle for the state activities.
					
					 It introduced the main contents of the constitution:
					
					 The Socialist Constitution of the DPRK is a political charter which codifies the successes made by the Korean people in the revolution and construction under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea. It also stipulates all principles to be abided by in all fabrics of state activities and social life and important tasks facing the socialist construction.
					
					 The constitution has served as law adopted by the Korean people themselves, the law which has been unequivocally supported by them over the last four decades and a mighty engine propelling revolution and construction.
					
					 The Russian paper Obektivnaya Gazeta and the internet homepages of Moscow Workers' Union of Russia and Rostov-Na-Donu Anti-Bourgeois Front carried similar articles.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities Introduced by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities Introduced by Foreign Media
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Foreign media reported about the revolutionary activities of the dear respected Kim Jong Un from Dec. 30 last year to Jan. 2 this year.
					 The Chinese News Service said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, had a photo session with the scientists, technicians, workers and officials who made a contribution to the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2.
					
					 He highly praised them once again for successfully implementing the behests of leader Kim Jong Il and fully demonstrating the national power of the DPRK.
					
					 He expressed the expectation and belief that they would develop and launch varieties of working satellites and carrier rockets of greater performance in the same spirit and stamina as were displayed in the launch of above-mentioned satellite, thus glorifying the country.
					
					 The news service said that the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea arranged a grand banquet again for them.
					
					 Similar news was reported by such Chinese Internet homepages as Xinhua, Huan Qiu and News networks and Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD. of Hong Kong, China, and ITAR-TASS.
					
					 Meanwhile, the above-said internet homepages, ITAR-TASS and the Nepalese Sakirmata TV conveyed the news that he together with his wife visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on the New Year's Day to pay high tribute to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
